name: positive and negative
description:
This game was made for the ScoreSpace Jam 18, which had a theme of "magnetic".

Bugs:

There is a slight bug with the game not being actually randomized.

Music lags when playing in browser, this doesn't seem to effect the exe version.

I am unable to test whether or not the Linux download works.

I am unable to get a mac download.

Leaderboard:

Please make a comment with a screenshot of your score to add your score to the leaderboard, so far I have a personal best of 35.

1. Sc0rpiOn - 157

2. MM's Gaming Co - 91

3. Housebird Games - 49

4. Mdfry - 35

5. ?

Credits:

Music from "Free Casual Game Music Pack Vol.2"by Zakiro101 at the asset store. The specific track being "Track 2 (Party Tonight)" - https://zakiro101.itch.io/free-casual-game-music-pack-vol-2 (I am not affiliated with this user)

Edit: This game was made while referring to the documentation.
